name: FreeBox Network Scanner
description: This module use FreeBox Server API to detect user presence by scanning the Wi-Fi network for connected phones.
instructionsHTML:
Need Gladys version >= 3.9.1.

Documentation

  • Install the module in Gladys
  • Create a Gladys Param in Parametres => Parametres with name NETWORK_SCANNER_FREQUENCY_IN_MINUTE to define the frequency in minute to scan your network.
  • Click on Configure into the module section and accept module on the FreeBox server
  • Reboot Gladys
instructionsMarkDown:
Need Gladys version >= 3.9.1.

##Documentation
 - Install the module in Gladys
 - Create a Gladys Param in Parametres => Parametres with name NETWORK_SCANNER_FREQUENCY_IN_MINUTE to define the frequency in minute to scan your network.
 - Click on Configure into the module section and accept module on the FreeBox server
 - Reboot Gladys
